    • Method Detail

      • F

        public double F(PVector T)
        Computes the log normalizer \f$ F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) \f$.
        Specified by:
        F in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \theta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ F(\mathbf{\Theta}) = n \log (1 + \exp \theta) - \log (n!) \f$

      • gradF

        public PVector gradF(PVector T)
        Computes \f$ \nabla F ( \mathbf{\Theta} )\f$.
        Specified by:
        gradF in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \theta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) = \frac{n \exp \theta}{1 + \exp \theta} \f$

      • G

        public double G(PVector H)
        Computes \f$ G(\mathbf{H})\f$.
        Specified by:
        G in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = \eta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ G(\mathbf{H}) = \eta \log \left( \frac{\eta}{n-\eta} \right) - n \log\left( \frac{n}{n-\eta} \right) \f$

      • gradG

        public PVector gradG(PVector H)
        Computes \f$ \nabla G (\mathbf{H})\f$
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = \eta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla G( \mathbf{H} ) = \log \left( \frac{\eta}{n-\eta} \right) \f$

        public double k(PVector x)
        Computes the carrier measure \f$ k(x) \f$.
        Specified by:
        k in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        x - a point
        Returns:
        \f$ k(x) = - \log (x! (n-x)!) \f$

        public PVector Lambda2Theta(PVector L)
        Converts source parameters to natural parameters.
        Specified by:
        Lambda2Theta in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        L - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = p \f$
        Returns:
        natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \log \left( \frac{p}{1-p} \right) \f$

      • Theta2Lambda

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \theta \f$
        Returns:
        source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = \frac{\exp \theta}{1 + \exp \theta} \f$

      • Eta2Lambda

        public PVector Eta2Lambda(PVector H)
        Converts expectation parameters to source parameters.
        Specified by:
        Eta2Lambda in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = \eta\f$
        Returns:
        source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = \frac{\eta}{n} \f$

      • density

        public double density(PVector x,
             PVector param)
        Computes the density value \f$ f(x;p) \f$.
        Overrides:
        density in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        x - a point
        param - parameters (source, natural, or expectation)
        Returns:
        \f$ f(x;p) = \frac{n!}{x!(n-x)!} p^x (1-p)^{n-x} \f$

        private double fact(double n)
        Computes the factorial of a number.
        Parameters:
        n - number
        Returns:

      • KLD

        public double KLD(PVector L1,
         PVector L2)
        Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between two Binomial distributions.
        Specified by:
        KLD in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        L1 - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_1 \f$
        L2 - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_2 \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ D_{\mathrm{KL}}(f_1\|f_2) = n (1-p_1) \log \left( \frac{1-p_1}{1-p_2} \right) + n p_1 \log \left( \frac{p_1}{p_2} \right) \f$
